misuse: CWE-330: Use of Insufficiently Random Values
description: The random password generation using random.ints() method is not cryptographically secure and should not be used for generating passwords or cryptographic keys.
recommendation: Use a cryptographically secure random number generator like SecureRandom to generate passwords or cryptographic keys.
